document_name: 75021 CSR Project Document fully signed and stamped.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/ROU/00059835/75021 CSR Project Document fully signed and stamped.pdf

outputs.output_descr: The project promotes the concept of Corporate Social Responsibility among the Romanian SMEs sector stimulating interest in activities generating more than just a direct return, thus contributing towards long-term investments in human capital or the environment increasing competitiveness and ensuring a higher quality of life for the local community.

project_descr: The project stimulate employers' and other stakeholders' interest to increase investment in human resources and to increase Romanian companies' social responsibility.
project_title: Increased adaptability of Rom companies through CSR
